search_results.title: jeopardy/2753_Qs.txt at master  jedoublen/jeopardy  GitHub

question: (Kelly of the Clue Crew stands with a packaging machine at the Crayola Museum & Factory in Easton, PA.)  In the early 1900s, this "American Gothic" artist entered a Crayola coloring contest & won; he later said that's what gave him the encouragement he needed to pursue a career in art
